podcastContent: 敦煌壁画常常画这张画，就是维摩诘和文殊的对话。但我自己喜欢这一部经，常常抄这一部经，所以我觉得里面的对话好精彩。因为文殊菩萨进来了，到了病房就问说，诶，你是一个修行的人，那修行的人怎么会生病呢？你不是应该修行的这个程度已经很高了，你应该到了不生病的状况。那维摩诘就回答说：从师有爱，则我病生八个字，我常常写这8个字送朋友，我们知道痴情的痴这个字，就是理应知道不应该做的事，可是我情不自禁，我还是会做，从痴有爱，那我们也觉得很有趣，菩萨到底应不应该有爱，如果有爱是不是也有恨。就我觉得他触碰到大乘佛学非常惊人的部分，就从痴有爱则我病生，所以我生病，那文殊菩萨就问他，那你什么时候病会好。他说一切众生病好，我的病也就好。这个时候我们忽然发现维摩诘讲的病，不是一般的病，是说他承担了所有众生之病，我们知道这是大乘佛学。我们有一天知道一个人的修行到一定的程度，那个不关心是因为他有更高的关心。他会看到所有在现实里的争吵之上，应该有一个更为亲明的东西。所以我们常读到无无明，对无明的一种堪悟，能够有更大的了悟的可能。这是为摩皆经一直要传达的。

analysis.contentEssence: 以“病”为自觉的慈悲载体：从痴爱而生的痛感，被转化为与众生同病的承担与更高层次的了悟。
analysis.physicalMetaphor: 一盏油灯把灯芯的热与痛集中在一点，让火光覆盖整个房间；灯芯不熄，光便替周围的人照见暗处。
analysis.metaphorVisualization: 画面以一个“燃点/灯芯”作为唯一主形体，周围扩散出柔和的光晕层，光晕越外越淡；中心高对比、边缘渐隐，用“中心承受—外圈照亮”的几何层次表达‘以自受之热换众生可见之明’。

tension.from: “修行者为何会病”的表面矛盾与痴爱之痛
tension.to: “众生病好我病方好”的承担与更高关心

topologicalLayout.zoneCountReason: physicalMetaphor 是“单一灯芯燃点照亮全室”，核心在一个中心承受点向外辐射，不需要分成多个对立区域。
topologicalLayout.divisionMethodReason: 光从燃点向外扩散天然是向心/离心的同心结构，最贴合“病/热在中心、慈悲与了悟向外照明”。

primaryRelationship.typeReason: 意象的主角是唯一的灯芯燃点（维摩诘之“病”作为载体），其余一切都是由它发出的光晕与留白。

rhythmSignature.typeReason: 对话的推进像一圈圈回响：从“为何生病”到“因爱而病”再到“与众生同病”，意义不断外扩并余韵加深，对应光晕的层层扩散。

structureParams.tensionExpression: 用中心小而灼亮的高对比“燃点”表现‘痴爱之热/病’，再以外圈更大但更淡的光晕表现‘承担众生之病后的澄明’，张力来自“中心疼痛的密度”与“外围安宁的广度”的同时存在。

antiTemplateCheck.howIsThisDifferent: 整体是单域向外辐射的“燃点—光晕”结构，依靠中心承受与环形扩散表达语义，不通过任何左右并列或对照分区来讲故事。

prompt:
[CANVAS]
- Format: 1:1 square, 1024x1024 pixels
- Safe margin: 10% padding (keep all forms well inside)
- Whitespace target: 68% (large quiet field, Ma)
- Visual weight distribution: extreme center-weight (tiny, intense nucleus) with very light radial echoes dissolving outward

[TOPOLOGY] — based on topologicalLayout
- Zone count: 1 (no partitions, no panels)
- Division method: radial (concentric expansion from a single point)
- Zone ratios: 100/0 (single continuous room-like field)
- Physical metaphor visualization: depict a single wick-like ignition point that holds the heat/pain, while its illumination expands to cover the entire silent room via outward halos

[RELATIONSHIPS] — based on primaryRelationship
- Primary relationship type: solo
- Interaction quality: touching (the glow touches the nucleus; the first halo nearly kisses the central shape)
- Spatial expression: place one small central ‘burn point’ slightly above exact center (subtle human vulnerability), surrounded by halos that remain centered on it

[RHYTHM] — based on rhythmSignature
- Rhythm type: echoing
- Element count: 3
- Interval/size variation: three concentric rings/halos with increasing radius; each repetition becomes broader and fainter (echo decay), spacing gently increases while opacity decreases

[GEOMETRY]
- Primary shape: a tiny vertical teardrop/short wick-flame abstract mark (not literal), about 2.5–3.5% of canvas height, centered; edges soft with gradient-fade
- Secondary shapes: three concentric halo-rings (very thin band-like circles or soft rings), each ring progressively larger and more transparent; keep them perfectly radial, no left-right split
- Lines: none (avoid any dividing line, diagonal slash, or axis)
- Edge treatment: gradient-fade (soft-division), clean vector-like boundaries with subtle feathering; no hard outlines
- Negative space: dominant; halos dissolve into the background, leaving large untouched cool-mist field

[COLOR]
- Background: cool-mist #F5F7FA
- Primary hue: serene-blue #B3E5FC (main nucleus glow + main halo area), keep lightness high (>=85%), saturation restrained (<=32%)
- Secondary hue (accent): celadon #DCEDC8 only as a tiny ‘awakening’ tint (area ~3%), applied via low-opacity overlay (13%) on one small segment near the inner halo (not a separate region)
- Temperature: lucid-cool overall; warm-cool contrast is subtle and low-frequency
- Contrast method: area contrast (one large, faint blue halo field versus one tiny intense nucleus)
- Accent usage: the celadon accent must be small and quiet (2–5% range, target 3%), semi-transparent (10–15%, use 13%)

[LIGHTING]
- Light source: soft internal emission from the nucleus
- Glow effects: exactly 2 glow/gradient halos (inner + middle); the outer echo is a non-glow soft ring or very faint band (no extra glow)
- Ambient atmosphere: calm, clinical-quiet room light; clarity without harshness

[TEXTURE & MATERIAL] — degree micro-adjustments only
- Surface quality: matte, paper-like (very subtle grain)
- Edge sharpness: softly precise (Prajñā ‘cutting’ expressed by controlled edges, not by splitting the canvas)
- Transparency: high in outer halos; nucleus remains the densest point

[ATMOSPHERE & MOOD]
- Japanese aesthetic: Ma (spacious pause), Kanso (few forms), Shibui (quiet depth)
- Content resonance: compassion and lucid insight—pain concentrated in one point, illumination expanding calmly

[STYLE]
- Render style: clean vector-like digital art, high clarity at 128px thumbnail
- No photorealism, no 3D rendering, no text, no symbols, no UI elements, no literal lamp illustration
- Keep within constraints: shapes ≤3, lines ≤2, gradients/glows ≤2, hue colors ≤2 (blue + green), whitespace ≥55%
